verses.roman:
premāveśe mahāprabhu upavana pāñā
puṣpodyāne gṛha-piṇḍāya rahilā paḍiyā

synonyms: prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; upavana pāñā—having come to a nice nearby garden; puṣpa-udyāne—in that flower garden; gṛha-piṇḍāya—on the raised platform; rahilā—remained; paḍiyā—falling flat.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to the garden. Immersed in a great ecstatic emotion, He fell flat on a raised platform there.
